Localization.Name: Clark Defense Systems
Localization.Description:
Ground-combat defensive systems, covers a lot of commercial territory from personal armor to defense systems. Naming convention tend to be pretty straight-forward and logical.

Models: PAB-4 (Personal Ablative/Ballistic Light Armor)

QDB-12 QuiKCade (Quick Deployment Barricade)

English.Name: Clark Defense Systems
English.Description:
Ground-combat defensive systems, covers a lot of commercial territory from personal armor to defense systems. Naming convention tend to be pretty straight-forward and logical.

Models: PAB-4 (Personal Ablative/Ballistic Light Armor)

QDB-12 QuiKCade (Quick Deployment Barricade)

Localization.Name: ORC-mkV Legs Imperial
Localization.Description:
Item Type: Medium Armor
Damage Reduction: 30%
Temp. Rating: -55 / 85 °C
Radiation Protection: 26400 REM
Radiation Scrub Rate: 145.8 REM/s
Carrying Capacity: 4.0 µSCU

Dependable and durable armor never goes out of style. The ORC-mkV from Clark Defense Systems has been a battlefield staple for centuries. This highly regarded medium armor blends composite plating with a special fiber reinforced polymer to provide solid protection and a wide range of movement.
